name: Forkknife (moz306)
description:
Forkknife is a  Multiplayer game with hide and seek tag elements.  

Two worlds collide! 

As the a space slug find and take your human host then complete the task bestowed upon you by the your slug overload!  Replenish energy with what you can find or face host rejection.

Foil hats unite!

The hour of judgement is upon us! take to the streets with your  A-salt pistol and scanner to eradicate the invading slug force.
